document_data.caption: Iref Marsk (center bottom); Iref Marsk's sword (left)
document_data.name: Iref Marsk
document_data.deathnotes: (approximate year)<ref group="note" name="NN">The story is assumed to occur during the reign of Gareth Dragonsbane, as Pavel Shemov claims the king is "a paladin of Ilmater" and this happens prior to 1373. Gareth Dragonsbane rose to power in 1359 DR, with no other kings of Damara known to be such paladins of Ilmater. Thus, this article is written under the assumption that the events of Silverfish occur during the 1360s DR. slain by [[barghest]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Iref Marsk''' was a guard in [[Heliogabalus]] as of the late mid-14{{th}} century DR.
document_data.Description: He was stocky. His hair was "foppishly" barbered, slicked with oil.
document_data.Possessions: As of the time of his death, he'd bought an amethyst and gold earring.
document_data.History:
Iref Marsk was part of the raid on [[Kosef Demsk]]'s room the morning he was captured at some point in the 1360s DR.<ref group="note" name="NN"/>

Nights later, while leaving a brothel, he was followed by [[Pavel Shemov]] and [[Tana Farag]], who suspected he had worked to frame Kosef; though he noticed them, they caught up to him.{{cite dragon/327/The Silverfish|44}} but before they could, he was slain by a [[barghest]].{{cite dragon/327/The Silverfish|46}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Though they never actually managed to prove it, Pavel Shemov and Tana Farag had reason to believe that Iref Marsk had employed some device as he entered Kosef's home to dissolve a duplicate of Kosef's signature weapon which had been swapped for the real thing.{{cite dragon/327/The Silverfish|48}}
